course_description: This course will investigate social and political philosophies as presented by some of their most famous proponents. Discussion will include such topics as the legitimate basis of the state, the structure of the social contract, and the nature of liberty and equality.
prerequisites: Two PHIL courses or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1378, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: M. Sullivan, Status: Open
